title.rendered: Exathlon all star, what are the exclusive NFTS?

content.rendered:
Exathlon All Star
April 22, 2022 3:00 p.m.

In thanks to the fans of Exathlon all startv azteca released a series of memories that the fans who All Star Exathlon may have in their hands, are the Exclusive NFTS, then, in ella+e we tell you all the details of how you can obtain the Exclusive NFTS.

More news from Exatlón All Star:

PATO ARAUJO REVIVED THE CONTROVERSY OF MATI AND EVE IN EXATLON ALL STAR

What are the NFTS of Exatlón All Star?

fans of Exathlon All Starthey will have to answer some questions in the application “Aztec TV Live” and only a few will manage to obtain digital memories. Starting Friday, April 22, you can become one of the few fans to receive exclusive, collectible virtual memorabilia from the most demanding reality show on the planet.

Always on the vanguard, Exathlon All Starwas the first project to incorporate NFT’swith the aim of providing a new experience for the project community led by Antonio Rosique. The NFT’s they are digital certificates of authenticity that can be obtained like any other type of property. They are unique pieces, which makes them rare and collectible, so their value increases over time.

Like the cards we collected as children, souvenirs from Exathlon All Star have conquered the hearts of fans in digital format. You can win t-shirts, medals and digital trophies from Exathlon All Starit doesn’t matter if you’re red or blue, because NFT’s are waiting for their owners and die-hard fans of our show.

This is something never seen before thanks to the innovative mission of Aztec TVwhich opens the way to new technologies in Mexico and Latin America.

How can I get a virtual “NFT” from Exatlón All Star?

Obtaining a digital certificate for your favorite team is easier than you think, because you only have to enter the “TV Azteca Live” from Friday April 22, 2022. Answer the questions and show that you are a fan of Exathlon all star.

If you answer all the questions correctly and you are better than anyone else, you can get one of these NFT’s. You will need a crypto wallet to receive your digital memories,

Remember, there are only 120 one-of-a-kind pieces that no one else has: limited-edition contestant jerseys, coveted medals, or coveted championship trophies.Exathlon All Star is the first initiative to adapt to new technologies with this release, the community will be able to have unique collectibles that others cannot.
